statements: SELECT * FROM FinancialData WHERE transaction_type = 'debit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, merchant, amount FROM FinancialData WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE;
SELECT account_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM FinancialData GROUP BY account_name HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialData WHERE merchant LIKE '%Amazon%' AND amount > 50;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, account_name, account_number FROM FinancialData WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM FinancialData WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM FinancialData WHERE amount > 500 AND transaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM FinancialData GROUP BY account_name HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM FinancialData WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE GROUP BY transaction_date;
SELECT transaction_type, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM FinancialData GROUP BY transaction_type ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT full_name, address FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM user_profile WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, phone_number FROM user_profile WHERE address LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE phone_number IN ('1234567890', '9876543210', '5555555555');
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM fraud_detection GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_transactions > 3 ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE fraud_score > 50;
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, activity_description FROM suspicious_activity WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_name, detection_method FROM fraud_patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_transactions;
SELECT user_name, email, phone_number FROM user_accounts WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date, fraud_score FROM fraudulent_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM fraudulent_transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT pattern_name, detection_method FROM fraud_patterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance < 0 ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount >= 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions JOIN accounts ON transactions.account_id = accounts.account_id WHERE account_balance < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' AND customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM flagged_transactions WHERE flag_reason IN ('Suspicious Activity','Fraudulent Behavior') ORDER BY flag_timestamp DESC;
SELECT pattern_description, detection_method FROM fraud_patterns ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;
